name: The Penguin Game
description:
Whack them!  Bounce them!  Create Crazy Penguin Chaos!

The Penguin Game is a low-pressure, chilled-out penguin physics engine with some elements of puzzles and problem-solving.

Unlock new penguins as you figure out your own way to work through the game.  There isn't a single correct answer for any level.  You can experiment!

The Penguin Game has no lose conditions and allows players to work around levels they don't enjoy.  It really is just a fun time!

There are only 6 levels at the moment, but I've polished them a fair bit already, plus there will be more levels to come!  Your feedback is very much appreciated!

Look forward to hearing what you have to say!  :)
